alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 12:20AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and south central Broward Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1219 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Intersection Krome And U.S. 27 to Kendall. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Coral Gables, South Miami, Kendall, Miami Gardens, The Redland, Weston, North Miami, Doral, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Pinecrest, Opa-Locka, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, and Miami Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
